channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How are states spending their opioid settlement cash? Look yours up in this database
item.description: From addiction treatment to toy robot ambulances, here's how state and local governments used billions in opioid settlement funds in 2022 and 2023. Ex...

item.title: 7 tourists hospitalized after drinking cocktails at 5-star resort
item.description: They fell ill after drinking pina colada cocktails prepared at a bar in the five-star Warwick Fiji resort on the Coral Coast, officials said.

item.title: A desert festival where robots are the headliner
item.description: Scientists are using the Mojave Desert to test robots for the next space age.

item.title: The federal EV tax credit has an uncertain fate. What car shoppers should know
item.description: Currently, drivers can get a tax credit worth up to $7,500 for buying or leasing an EV. But the incoming administration promised to roll back those cr...

item.title: South Korea court begins Yoon's impeachment trial process
item.description: It has six months to decide whether to sustain or reject the vote to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol.

item.title: Legendary Indian tabla player Zakir Hussain dies at 73
item.description: The Indian classical music icon died of a lung disease at a hospital in San Francisco.

item.title: France rushes help to Mayotte, where hundreds are feared dead from Cyclone Chido
item.description: France was rushing help by ship and military aircraft to its poor overseas territory of Mayotte in the Indian Ocean on Monday after the island was sha...

item.title: 12/15: The Takeout: Rep. Seth Moulton
item.description: Massachusetts Rep. Seth Moulton joins Major Garrett to discuss the state of the Democratic Party and what it should do to attract voters and make gain...

item.title: Mayotte: 'It feels like nuclear war aftermath' after cyclone, residents say
item.description: Rescuers comb through the debris in the French Indian Ocean territory hit by the worst storm in 90 years.

item.title: Memphis man convicted of killing his bride on their honeymoon in Fiji in 2022
item.description: A man from Memphis, Tenn., Bradley Dawson, has been found guilty by a judge in Fiji of murdering his wife during their honeymoon in 2022, the prosecut...

item.title: Trump claims a 'massive' mandate, but presidents often overread their victories
item.description: There's a long history of presidents claiming that their win means the will of the people is behind their agendas. But elections are rarely full-throa...

item.title: Tourists in Fiji ill after suspected pina-colada poisoning
item.description: Authorities said the patients had drunk pina coladas at a five-star resort bar.

item.title: Survivors seek a reckoning as FBI investigates child sex abuse in little-known Christian sect
item.description: A small Christian sect that for decades was little noticed by the outside world has found itself riven by a very public child sex abuse scandal.

item.title: Twelve dead from carbon monoxide poisoning at Georgia ski resort
item.description: The bodies of 11 foreigners and one Georgian were found in a sleeping area above a restaurant in Gudauri.
